Posts.Content: Dec 9, 2008 01:52AM tekangelsurvior wrote: I have two more dose dense taxol treatments, then I am supposed to be through with my treatments.  My Dr. ordered a PET scan because of a slight rise in a tumor marker test he done.  I am worried but he tells me not to worry, he is 99% sure it's nothing but wants to make sure.  I don't know if this test is really necessary.  He also tells me that anxiety can make this number go up.  Please share your thoughts...
Posts.Title: PET scan??? shelray Jellydonut
